name: bj-hbsb3v
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0
body: |- wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wal(s1, wsb(s0, s1, w0)))

stmt.origin: syl(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wal(s1, wsb(s0, s1, w0)), wsb(s0, s1, wal(s0, w0)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wal(s1, wsb(s0, s1, w0)))
-| wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, wal(s0, w0)))
-| wi(wsb(s0, s1, wal(s0, w0)), wal(s1, wsb(s0, s1, w0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wal(s1, wsb(s0, s1, w0)))
-| wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, wal(s0, w0)))
-| wi(wsb(s0, s1, wal(s0, w0)), wal(s1, wsb(s0, s1, w0)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, wal(s0, w0)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wal(s1, wsb(s0, s1, w0)))
-| wi(wsb(s0, s1, wal(s0, w0)), wal(s1, wsb(s0, s1, w0)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wsb(s0, s1, wal(s0, w0)), wal(s1, wsb(s0, s1, w0)))
-| diffss(s0, s1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wal(s1, wsb(s0, s1, w0)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))
-| diffss(s0, s1)

comment: Version of ~ hbsb3 with a disjoint variable condition, which does not require ~ ax-13 . (Remark: the unbundled version of ~ nfs1 is given by ~ bj-nfs1v .) (Contributed by BJ, 11-Sep-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
